title: Customizing water-scarce, zinc ion-rich Helmholtz plane of zinc anode for Ah-scale Zn metal batteries
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE02909G, Paper
Xiaomei Huo, Zhenkai Zhou, Wei Huang, Guowei Gao, Boxin Li, Jingxuan Bi, Zhuzhu Du, Wei Ai
Reconstructing the Helmholtz plane (HP) on the zinc anode is a fundamental approach to suppress side reactions and dendrites growth, where the key is to redesign the HP to minimize...
